title: RecArt Demo
subtitle: Static showcase of selected generations
about: This page is a static demo. No backend calls are made.
Use it to present representative outputs, prompts, and settings.

results.title: Red Girl with Kite
results.notes: Profile-view girl in a flowing red dress flying a red kite, with painterly textures, warm directional light, birds, and reflective ground near traditional architecture.
results.prompt: Full-body frame. A young girl stands in profile facing to the right, her body angled slightly forward as she holds the string of a red, diamond-shaped kite. She has dark, shoulder-length hair that falls naturally around her face, with a few loose strands lifted by the breeze. She wears a flowing red dress that flares outward at the hem, its fabric caught in motion, revealing black leggings and dark shoes beneath. Her left arm extends downward as she grips the taut kite string, while her right arm hangs loosely at her side. Behind her, a traditional East Asian-style building occupies the right side of the composition, featuring a dark tiled roof, wooden eaves, and layered architectural lines. The background is rendered as a textured, painterly wash of ochre, yellow, and gray, with visible brushstrokes, drips, and uneven pigment density. A small cluster of dark birds flies near the girl's head and along the kite string, adding a sense of movement. The ground beneath her is dark and reflective, possibly wet stone, mirroring her silhouette and the base of the building. Warm directional light enters from the upper left, casting soft shadows. On the left side of the composition, red calligraphic characters appear, their brushwork bold and expressive.

results.title: Weathered Marble Statue
results.prompt: A weathered marble statue of a human figure fills the composition, its head turned slightly to the right. Chiseled facial features show softened edges from age, with hair rendered in layered stone curls and faint cracks running across the surface. The nose and lips are partially worn, revealing erosion and subtle discoloration. Directional light from the upper left casts sharp shadows that emphasize carved planes and stone texture. The background is neutral and unfocused, allowing the pale sculpture to dominate. Rendered as a realistic study of form, material, and light.
results.notes: Realistic close study of an aged marble bust with erosion, cracking, and directional light emphasizing stone form and texture.

results.title: Low-Poly Pancakes in Kelp Forest
results.prompt: Low-poly scene of a stack of golden-brown pancakes on a wooden plank in a kelp forest, centered in the midground. Faceted geometric shapes with visible polygon edges and flat per-face shading. A block of butter on top and syrup dripping and pooling below, both rendered as smooth, angular forms. Muted green and brown kelp, soft blue-green water with minimal haze. Diffused top-down light, eye-level side view, clean geometry, limited color palette, no realistic textures or depth of field.
results.notes: Stylized low-poly food scene using flat per-face shading, limited palette, and clean geometric forms in an underwater kelp setting.

results.title: Anime Girl on Rainy Tokyo Street
results.prompt: Anime-style illustration of a girl on a rainy Tokyo street at night. Short dark hair, neutral expression, simple white T-shirt and dark pants. Rain falls steadily, streetlights and distant buildings softly glowing and reflected on wet pavement. Cool blue tones with gentle warm lights in the background, calm mood, eye-level view, quiet urban atmosphere.
results.notes: Calm anime night scene with steady rain, reflective pavement, and balanced cool ambient tones with soft warm city lights.

results.title: Low-Poly Darth Vader
results.prompt: Low-poly Darth Vader sitting on a simple block seat, rendered with faceted geometric shapes, sharp polygon edges, and flat shading. Dark black and gray armor with subtle blue accents. Minimal background made of angular crystalline forms, clean geometry, limited color palette, no realistic textures, no depth of field.
results.notes: Stylized low-poly character render emphasizing faceted forms, flat shading, and constrained palette in a minimal geometric scene.

results.title: Misty Ink Mountain Forest
results.prompt: Chinese ink landscape painting of a misty mountain forest. Tall, slender trees rise through layered fog, their forms rendered with loose brushwork and varying ink density. Soft washes of pale beige and gray create depth and atmosphere. A thin crescent moon hangs in the open sky above, adding balance and quiet focus. Minimal composition, flowing brush strokes, empty space emphasized, tranquil and contemplative mood.
results.notes: Minimal Chinese ink-style landscape with layered mist, expressive brush density variation, and quiet negative space around a crescent moon.

results.title: Expanse
results.prompt: Wide panoramic landscape showinga rocky ridge overlooking a vast valley below. In the foreground, jagged stones and sparse grasses are rendered with sharp detail, their textures clearly defined. Beyond them, rolling hills and dense forests recede into the distance, gradually losing contrast and saturation as atmospheric haze softens their outlines. Farther still, pale mountain silhouettes rise against a washed sky, barely distinguishable from the horizon. The small human figure provides a sense of scale, dwarfed by the surrounding terrain. Cool daylight and long shadows emphasize depth and distance, creating a quiet, expansive mood.
results.notes: Panoramic ridge-to-valley composition using atmospheric perspective, cool daylight, and long shadows to emphasize scale and depth.
